expt_aim: To see if two sentences shared the same meaning even though they were worded differently.
expt_gen: Good experiment I wouldn't mind doing again.
sent2: I really enjoy walking in the woods alone.
The player was skillful or hardworking.
He thought the shirt was good.
Two of the students were tired.
All of the movies were funny.
sent1: I really enjoy going sailing with my father.
I really don't like eating out at upscale places..
The weekends were sometimes but not always sunny.
The player was either skillful or hardworking.
He thought the shirt was excellent.
Two but not three of the students were tired.
Some but not all of the movies were funny.
